content.raw: After testing this PR through its commit history and even into Gazebo7, I think that the issue is not from this PR. I am having problem at least since the changeset 36226, I didn’t tested it further, but that is the parent commit for the initial branch. I suspect this is a problem with the dependencies, not gazebo itself. I think we can go forward merging this PR at least you want to do further research @iche033 .
